answerText: liver[10] This vein carries blood from the enteric system from the liver.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 18 | 11 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The blockage of one vein that passes through this structure causes esophageal varices and a horrific condition in which the abdominal veins become visible, called caput medusa. For 10 points each: [10] Name this organ, which is scarred and fibrosed in a condition common in longterm alcoholics called cirrhosis.
